### findInsertPt() {#a2552852df498fdb18e9bfb9774ff333e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Instruction &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopPredication.cpp&#125;::LoopPredication::findInsertPt (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; User, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; Ops)</>}>
Return an insertion point suitable for inserting a safe to speculate instruction whose only user will be &#39;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a>&#39; which has operands &#39;Ops&#39;.

A trivial result would be the at the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> itself, but we try to return a loop invariant location if possible.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/looppredication-cpp/#l00281">281</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/looppredication-cpp">LoopPredication.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### findInsertPt() {#a4fc50a70ad2840e71929161c96ed1b41}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Instruction &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopPredication.cpp&#125;::LoopPredication::findInsertPt (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander">SCEVExpander</a> &amp; Expander, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; User, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42; &gt; Ops)</>}>
Same as above, <em>except</em> that this uses the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> definition of invariant which is that an expression <em>can be made</em> invariant via <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander">SCEVExpander</a>.

Thus, this version is only suitable for finding an insert point to be passed to SCEVExpander!

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/looppredication-cpp/#l00286">286</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/looppredication-cpp">LoopPredication.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isLoopInvariantValue() {#a1747a50d5388e6c2cd5feca8cbfd9b05}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoopPredication::isLoopInvariantValue (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42; S)</>}>
Return true if the value is known to produce a single fixed value across all iterations on which it executes.

Note that this does not imply speculation safety. That must be established separately.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/looppredication-cpp/#l00292">292</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/looppredication-cpp">LoopPredication.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/looppredication-cpp/#l00275">275</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/looppredication-cpp">LoopPredication.cpp</a>.

### predicateLoopExits() {#a83dbfb31c12bba10204f15c1bd8c1117}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoopPredication::predicateLoopExits (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander">SCEVExpander</a> &amp; Rewriter)</>}>
This implements an analogous, but entirely distinct transform from the main loop predication transform.

This one is phrased in terms of using a widenable branch <em>outside</em> the loop to allow us to simplify loop exits in a following loop. This is close in spirit to the IndVarSimplify transform of the same name, but is materially different widening loosens legality sharply.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/looppredication-cpp/#l00320">320</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/looppredication-cpp">LoopPredication.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### widenICmpRangeCheck() {#a2f9bcfd081a08ab4013c9e96984fd3f8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; Value &#42; &gt; LoopPredication::widenICmpRangeCheck (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/icmpinst">ICmpInst</a> &#42; ICI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander">SCEVExpander</a> &amp; Expander, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Guard)</>}>
If ICI can be widened to a loop invariant condition emits the loop invariant condition in the loop preheader and return it, otherwise returns std::nullopt.

### DL {#a4092e86c74ce6bf566170fb85319ac01}
